channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 埃及与国际货币基金组织（IMF）签署了扩大后的 80 亿美元贷款协议。皮埃尔-布里安孔认为，如果基金组织对未来改革的乐观态度没有得到阿卜杜勒-法塔赫-塞西总统的证实，那么埃及将面临对 1,650 亿美元外债进行痛苦重组的局面。
item.description:
Egypt signed an expanded $8 billion loan deal with the IMF. If the Fund's optimism about future reforms is not justified by President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, a painful restructuring of the $165 billion external debt lies ahead, according to Pierre Briancon https://t.co/sqAri5G4XF pic.twitter.com/AzeYfzJE1y

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 解说员：纽约立法者再次解决主权债务重修问题
item.description:
Explainer: New York lawmakers tackle sovereign debt reworks again https://t.co/rxoRp3zig2 pic.twitter.com/zAeKfgBFNb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: Zara 的所有者 Inditex 面临着投资者的呼吁，要求其公布全部供应商名单，以便投资者更好地评估环境影响和劳工实践等方面的风险。H&M和Primark等竞争对手已经公布了他们从哪些工厂采购。
item.description:
Zara-owner Inditex faces calls from investors to make public its full list of suppliers so they can better assess risks over things like environmental impact and labor practices. Rivals like H&M and Primark already publish which factories they source from https://t.co/7m4gxw5Wwd pic.twitter.com/ImkKOtSSju

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 350 亿美元的天然气重聚追踪着跌宕起伏的市场
item.description:
Breakingviews - A $35 bln gas reunion tracks a topsy-turvy market https://t.co/kZuQp1f0lc https://t.co/kZuQp1f0lc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：社交媒体平台 Reddit 表示，其美国首次公开募股（IPO）的目标估值将高达 64 亿美元，这是过去几年中最受瞩目的股市首次公开募股之一。
item.description:
WATCH: Reddit aims for a valuation of up to $6.4 billion in its US IPO, the social media platform said, as it nears one of the most-anticipated stock market debuts of the last few years https://t.co/tZcodCF1bZ pic.twitter.com/Nrv248JBSv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：比特币首次突破 70,000 美元大关，在欧洲交易中上涨了 4.8%，达到创纪录的 71,677 美元，使今年迄今为止的涨幅达到 70
item.description:
WATCH: Bitcoin surged past the $70,000 mark for the first time and rose by as much as 4.8% to a record $71,677 in European trading, bringing gains for the year so far to 70% https://t.co/JHt0rsXjhX pic.twitter.com/m1bt825uV8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在阿联酋注入 350 亿美元现金后，开罗获得了国际货币基金组织 80 亿美元的贷款。皮埃尔-布里安孔说，如果阿卜杜勒-法塔赫-塞西总统不能证明基金组织对改革的乐观态度是正确的，那么前面就是对 1,650 亿美元外债的重组。
item.description:
Cairo received an $8 billion IMF loan after a $35 billion cash injection from the UAE. If President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi doesn't justify the Fund's optimism about reforms, a restructuring of the $165 billion external debt lies ahead, Pierre Briancon says https://t.co/sqAri5G4XF pic.twitter.com/Vgsb4b93Nx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 汇丰将在美国招聘近 50 名银行家为初创企业和风险企业提供贷款服务
item.description:
HSBC to hire almost 50 bankers for startup, venture lending in US https://t.co/YrhknpuFaN pic.twitter.com/ukq7vq2nyN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 投资者希望 Zara 所有者 Inditex 效仿竞争对手 H&M 和 Primark，公布其全部供应商名单，以便他们更好地评估供应链风险。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Investors want Zara owner Inditex to follow rivals H&M and Primark in making its full list of suppliers public so they can better assess any supply chain risks. More here: https://t.co/7m4gxw5oGF pic.twitter.com/7FeeEezlnq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：比特币创下历史新高，突破 71,000 美元，最大加密货币的飙升势头丝毫没有放缓的迹象
item.description:
WATCH: Bitcoin hit a record high above $71,000, as the surge in the biggest cryptocurrency showed no signs of slowing down https://t.co/JHt0rsXR7v pic.twitter.com/2ZkBsI0JXE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：为人工智能提供芯片的英伟达公司被三位作家起诉，他们称英伟达未经许可使用了他们受版权保护的书籍来训练其 NeMo 人工智能平台。
item.description:
WATCH: Nvidia, whose chips power artificial intelligence, has been sued by three authors who said it used their copyrighted books without permission to train its NeMo AI platform https://t.co/0rx2ehrM6v pic.twitter.com/u7vX41eyGc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：政府数据显示，日本经济避免了技术性衰退，尽管第四季度的上行变化弱于预期，并凸显了对经济复苏乏力的担忧
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's economy avoided a technical recession, revised government data, even though the upward change in the fourth quarter was weaker than expected and highlighted concerns about the sluggish economic recovery https://t.co/YE7KRlwJDj pic.twitter.com/9ASwIJOiBb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：Brian Keene、Abdi Nazemian 和 Stewart O'Nan 三位著名作家起诉 Nvidia 公司，声称他们的作品是由大约 196,640 本书籍组成的数据集的一部分，而该数据集帮助训练 NeMo 人工智能平台模拟普通书面语言。
item.description:
WATCH: Three prominent authors, Brian Keene, Abdi Nazemian and Stewart O'Nan, have sued Nvidia and claimed that their works were part of a dataset of about 196,640 books that helped train the NeMo AI platform to simulate ordinary written language https://t.co/0rx2ehsjW3 pic.twitter.com/JDs183fr0i

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 中国有能力收起货币火箭筒

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：修订后的国内生产总值（GDP）数据显示，日本经济在 10 月至 12 月间增长了 0.4%，从而避免了经济衰退。然而，新数据远低于预期
item.description:
WATCH: Japan has dodged a recession as revised GDP numbers showed the economy growing 0.4% over the October-December quarter. However, the new figure well below forecasts https://t.co/YE7KRlwbNL pic.twitter.com/xIsYRpbxiP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着英国购物者每周都试图进一步压缩开支，超市龙头企业乐购（Tesco）和塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）正利用其强大的财力，从负债累累、难以与之抗衡的竞争对手手中赢得顾客。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
As British shoppers try to stretch their spending further each week, supermarket leaders Tesco and Sainsbury's are using their superior financial firepower to win over customers from debt-laden rivals struggling to compete. More here: https://t.co/x0c25lbulE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 独家：投资者希望 Zara 所有者 Inditex 效仿竞争对手 H&M 和 Primark，公布其全部供应商名单，以便他们更好地评估供应链风险。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Investors want Zara owner Inditex to follow rivals H&M and Primark in making its full list of suppliers public so they can better assess any supply chain risks. More here: https://t.co/1YSojmtCgF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 大量人工智能初创企业的涌入使欧洲的技术人才争夺战日趋白热化，谷歌 DeepMind 等公司不得不在支付高额费用或失去该地区最优秀人才之间做出选择。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
An influx of artificial intelligence startups is heating up the battle for technical talent in Europe, leaving companies like Google DeepMind to choose between paying big or losing out on the region's best minds. More here: https://t.co/YXrFw63rE2

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在特斯拉（Tesla）与澳大利亚汽车游说团断绝关系几天后，澳大利亚大众汽车公司（Volkswagen Australia）表示已退出该国汽车游说团的政策制定委员会。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Volkswagen Australia said it had quit the policymaking committee at the country's auto lobby, days after Tesla cut ties with the group, as the German carmaker distances itself from a campaign against new fuel standards. More here: https://t.co/MPwizgFHuR

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）正率领一个总统贸易和投资代表团访问菲律宾，以加强美国与整个地区的经济联系。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
US Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo is leading a presidential trade and investment mission to the Philippines as the United States looks to fortify economic ties across the region. More here: https://t.co/TngRDqqPfV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国的目标是成为印度洋-太平洋地区的 "首选经济伙伴"--雷蒙多
item.description:
US aims to be 'economic partner of choice' for Indo-Pacific- Raimondo https://t.co/5MU0XG9gKv pic.twitter.com/tIk8LDsa5M

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024
